From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 Indian Hindi-language film


Do AjnabeeDirected bySanjeev Kumar RajputScreenplay bySanjeev Kumar RajputProduced byAnu MitraSuraj SharmaMayank ShekharStarringAarya BabbarAnkit BathlaCinematographySantosh PalDilip PalEdited byBhautik NandhaMusic byDeepak GuptaProductioncompaniesBlockbuster Films & Entertainment PK EntertainmentRelease date
24 November 2023 (2023-11-24)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Do Ajnabee is Indian Hindi-language film, written and directed by Sanjeev Kumar Rajput.[1] The film stars Aarya Babbar, Ankit Bathla and Aman Yatan Verma.[2][3]


Plot[edit]
In the film, a company employee faces a moral dilemma when he unintentionally causes the death of a colleague who had a groundbreaking car design. The incident occurs as he seeks funds for his ailing brother's medical treatment. The narrative takes a compelling twist with the introduction of a female lead seeking retribution for her boyfriend's demise, leading to intricate and gripping dynamics among the characters.[4][5]

Cast[edit]
Aarya Babbar
Ankit Bathla[6]
Aman Yatan Verma
Anu Mitra[7]
Sunny Thakur
Filming[edit]
The film is mostly shot in Nainital, Uttarakhand, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.[8]

Soundtrack[edit]
Do AjnabeeSoundtrack album by Deepak GuptaReleased30 October 2023 (2023-10-30)Recorded2022-2023GenreFeature film soundtrackLength8:30LanguageHindiLabelRed Ribbon MusikExternal audio Video on YouTube
The music of the film is composed by Deepak Gupta and sung by singers including Yasser Desai, Palak Muchhal and others.

^ "मर्डर मिस्ट्री होगी फिल्म 'दो अजनबी', डायरेक्टर संजीव राजपूत ने जारी किया पोस्टर, नवंबर में होगी रिलीज". Navbharat Times (in Hindi). Retrieved 24 December 2023.

^ "Murder mystery thriller film Do Ajnabee poster released, Movie will hit cinemas in November". www.navbharattimes.indiatimes.com. 11 September 2023. Archived from the original on 3 June 2023. Retrieved 18 November 2023.

^ "Poster of Do Ajnabee released, the film will be a love story based on crime". www.outlookhindi.com. Archived from the original on 24 February 2023. Retrieved 18 November 2023.

^ Patrika (9 September 2022), "Crime Love Story film Do Ajnabee will create a splash on screen", www.patrika.com, archived from the original on 20 November 2023, retrieved 20 November 2023

^ "Ankit Bathla to romance with Anu Mitra in a film says, she was very professional during shoot". www.timesofindia.indiatimes.com. 13 September 2023. Archived from the original on 24 February 2023. Retrieved 18 November 2023.

^ Jagran. "Murder Mystery and thriller film Do Ajnabee will hit the silver screen in November". www.jagran.com. Archived from the original on 20 November 2023. Retrieved 20 November 2023.
